group_1.textCenter: (Honestly I don't feel like doing this but...)
(I'm supposed to return things I've borrowed.)

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's you...
I told you, it's fine.
But honestly, I didn't expect you to come see me.
...Yes?
Pardon me but may I ask what brings you here?
Well, your name is Hikaru who?

group_1.textRight: Today, I'm here to return the handkerchief I@borrowed from you.

group_1.textLeft: That makes sense...
I thought Kirari, you must be one of my supporters.
Right, after the school assembly...
...There have been many students visiting here to@ask if they can help my campaign.
Since you came all the way, how about you?@The more hands the better.

group_1.textRight: But I'm only, here to return your handkerchief.
Moreover, Hikaru's got a club, and Hikaru is not very@interested in the election.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
The school regulation says that it is allowed to be@absent from club activities for participating events or@school committee activities...
...Well, it can't be helped if you are not interested.
It should be.
An election campaign, is one of the legitimate@activities in the school.

group_1.textRight: Then actually, please let me help you.
Let Hikaru, help Yuna's election campaign!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* I am looking forward to working with@you, Kirari.
It's about time that printing the posters is finished,@right?

group_1.textRight: It's finished here, for the amount we need.

group_1.textLeft: How about your side Kirari?

group_1.textRight: Err, umm, there's not enough printers so...

group_1.textLeft: There are printers other than the ones in this@classroom, right?

group_1.textRight: I'll go look if there's anywhere else I can rent them!

group_1.textLeft: Well, I guess it would be something like that.
We can expect solid votes if we listen to someone's@troubles and solve them.

group_1.textRight: The kinds of troubles or worries we can advise are@pretty limited right?

group_1.textLeft: Even if we can only help one by one...
It will win us a large support as our reputation@spreads through.

group_1.textRight: Assuming that's true, is this something that needs@to be done by Yuna herself?
Because this is just...a troubleshooting, or I'd say,@helping someone find their lost items?
After carrying...this huge amount of documents...@to the classroom...

group_1.textLeft: Yes...right...just hold on...a little longer...
[chara:102103:effect_shake]Oh...!
...Now I've done it.
I'll pick them up quickly, so please wait a moment.

group_1.textRight: Erm...the student council president is the head@honcho right?
Why should a person who aims to be the@president do this kind of chore...
Don't you feel like it's fruitless somehow?

group_1.textLeft: How come?
I decided for myself that I will become the student@council president.
There is no way making efforts to become the@president is fruitless.

group_1.textRight: Hikaru can't really see how you can be so devoted@to it.
I've been worried that Yuna, is a 1st year right?
Your candidacy isn't even recognized by the school@regulations, actually...
You might end up not being able to run for the@election...

group_1.textLeft: It's for a simple reason...
...I am serious.
Yes, I will win this election by any means necessary.
As I am seriously wanting to change the school.
Also, I only fight a winning battle.
Well then, shall we go?

group_1.textCenter: She came out of nowhere...@That 1st year...
